name: Emberrush
description:
Immerse yourself in a fabulous atmosphere in Emberrush! You have to fight off waves of enemies that are heading towards your settlement.
To stop the enemy, you must build towers that have different properties.
Some attack in an area, some slow, some deal increased damage.
Also use your abilities to fend off enemies. Throw projectiles, plant bombs, call lightning and then you will win!

-Dynamic gameplay
-Crowds of enemies
-Interesting gameplay
